result.title: 1st step
result.content: Click on + icon and link all your checking/savings/credit card/investment accounts by logging into each account

result.title: 2nd step
result.content: Accounts that you could not link, click on + icon to manually enter details

result.title: 3rd Step
result.content: Click on Taxes thumbnail and upload your previous years 1040

result.title: 4th Step
result.content: Click on Insurance thumbnail and upload your insurance contract (if you have one.)
